text: merge multiple lines into single line by value of column
I have a tab-delimited text file that is very large.
Many lines in the file have the same value for one of the columns in the file.
I want to put them into same line.

code:
a foo
a bar
a foo2
b bar
c bar2

text: After run the script it should become:

code:
a foo;bar;foo2
b bar
c bar2

text: how can I do this in either a shell script or in Python?
